description:
Kenzo works at a natural wetlands area in the Kalos region. He identified Ash`s Goodra as Ash`s Goomy, the Goomy that used to live in the wetlands. He explained to Ash Ketchum and his friends that Ash`s Goomy used to live in those wetlands in peace with its friends, but a disturbance occurred over a spring in the area that has a soothing effect on a Pokémon`s mind and body.
Kenzo has a station in the wetlands which he maintains along with a boardwalk. He believe that humans should not interfere with wild Pokémon.
name: Kenzou
